comment.author: 69679868@N03
comment._content: It is quite likely that Private H Jones suffered from being gassed after attacking into the dispersing residue of Allied gas shelling.  There were British artillery bombardments firing gas in the opening stages of the Battle of Arras in April 1917 including at the First Battle of the Scarpe (9–14 April 1917);  the First Battle of Bullecourt (10–11 April 1917);  and the Battle of Lagnicourt (15 April 1917).//
